means: 位于(locate的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: I'll report back the moment I have located him.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一找到他就马上汇报。

sentence.Network_en: The most popular items are located toward the back of the store.
sentence.Network_cn: 最受欢迎的产品放在靠近商店最里面的地方。

sentence.Network_en: It is located within reach of many important Norman towns, including Bayeux.
sentence.Network_cn: 它邻近许多重要的诺曼城镇，包括贝叶。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Many of our plants are located in undeveloped areas ., 我们许多工厂坐落在发展欠发达地区.
Countries in which the rainforests are located are mostly poor and overpopulated., 地处热带雨林的国家大都贫穷 , 人口过剩.
located in special economic zones in the central , municipal finance , trade , information center ., 位处经济特区中部 , 市金融 , 商贸 , 信息中心.
It surprising that not all of those stations located on the floor ., 让人感到意外的是 , 这些车站并非都设在地上.

list.abs: ...元素最基本的信息，自然想到的是点（Point）作为位置（location），比如说你的位置在(250, 360)，但人不是大头针，物体总是有 …
Serai Inn ... Facilities 设备 Location 地点 Guestbook 留言板.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... locality n 位置，所在地 locate v 坐落，位于 location n 场所，位置.

entry.def: If something is located in a particular place, it is present or has been built there.

example.ex: The restaurant is located near the cathedral...
A boutique and beauty salon are conveniently located within the grounds.
example.tran: 时装店和美容院就在区内，非常方便。

means.word_mean: 1. situated in a particular spot or position;

auth_sentence.content: Maybe that person could be located and has records.
auth_sentence.res_content: Maybe that person could be located and has records.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maybe that person could be located and has records.

auth_sentence.content: We are located just minutes away from downtown Philadelphia.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are located just minutes away from downtown Philadelphia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are located just minutes away from downtown Philadelphia.

auth_sentence.content: This position is located at Fort Riley, Kansas.
auth_sentence.res_content: This position is located at Fort Riley, Kansas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This position is located at Fort Riley, Kansas.

Sentence.sentence: They are often located in poor neighborhoods.
They are all located in the south of France
It is located in the eastern part of Harrogate.

sentences.en: The house is conveniently located within the town centre.
sentences.cn: 该住宅位于市镇中心,很是方便。
